overview:
Jay Ganaden is a Digital Strategy and Business Development Executive.

Since 1995, Jay has led an adventurous and diverse life of professional experiences, including traditional management consulting at KPMG, Silicon Valley dotcoms (notably, DoubleClick and Yodlee), and his own ventures in Photography.

Today, Jay combines the skills of business strategy and creative expression, leading the Digital Strategy business for Momentum Design Lab, a user-experience design firm based in San Francisco.

Jay helps clients dream user experience. With that dream fresh in mind, he rallies Momentumâ€™s software engineering team to build the next mobile, social media, tablet, & enterprise software for brands like Intuit, VMWare and WalMart. Momentum is also a product developer and incubator– our current love: Add to Trip (www.addtotrip.co) a Social Travel Planning product.

Jay and his amazing wife Cindy, have a beautiful daughter Ava Blu, a snugly Boston Terrier Penny, and together live in the sunny hills of Oakland. Jay clears his head with Photography, and loves to race bicycles for Metromint Cycling when he can.

degrees.subject: Management Information Systems
degrees.institution: The University of Texas at Austin
